mapper.select: SELECT UR_NO, U_USERNAME, (SELECT S_NAME FROM S WHERE S_NOSTART=S_NO) AS S_NAMESTART, (SELECT S_NAME FROM S WHERE S_NOLAST=S_NO) AS S_NAMELAST, B_NO, TO_CHAR(UR_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UR_DATE FROM USER_RESERVE WHERE U_USERNAME = #{u_username} AND UR_STATE = 3
SELECT UR_NO, U_USERNAME, (SELECT S_NAME FROM S WHERE S_NOSTART=S_NO) AS S_NAMESTART, (SELECT S_NAME FROM S WHERE S_NOLAST=S_NO) AS S_NAMELAST, B_NO, UR_DATE FROM USER_RESERVE WHERE UR_NO = #{ur_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERLIST SET U_USERNAME=#{u_userName}, U_NAME=#{u_name}, U_USERPHONENUM=#{u_userphonenum}, U_ADDRESS=#{u_address}, U_GUARDNAME=#{u_guardname}, U_GUARDPHONENUM=#{u_guardphonenum}, U_GUARDRELATION=#{u_guardrelation} WHERE U_USERNAME=#{u_userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOC VALUES( (SELECT MAX(V_NO)+2 FROM VOC WHERE VOC_RECOMMEND != 0), #{c_username}, #{b_no}, #{u_username}, #{v_title}, #{v_content}, sysdate, null, #{voc_recommend})
mapper.select: SELECT V_NO, C_USERNAME, B_NO, U_USERNAME, V_TITLE, V_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS V_DATE, V_IMGEXTENTION, VOC_RECOMMEND FROM VOC WHERE U_USERNAME = #{u_username} AND VOC_RECOMMEND = 1 OR VOC_RECOMMEND = -1 ORDER BY V_NO

SELECT V_NO-1 AS V_NO, C_USERNAME, B_NO, U_USERNAME, V_TITLE, V_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(V_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS V_DATE, V_IMGEXTENTION, VOC_RECOMMEND FROM VOC WHERE U_USERNAME = #{u_username} AND VOC_RECOMMEND = 0 ORDER BY V_NO
SELECT DISTINCT UR.B_NO, B.C_USERNAME, UR.U_USERNAME FROM USER_RESERVE UR JOIN BUS B ON B.B_NO=UR.B_NO WHERE U_USERNAME = #{u_username} AND UR_STATE=3
SELECT V.*, U.U_TYPE FROM VOC V JOIN USERLIST U ON V.U_USERNAME=U.U_USERNAME WHERE V.V_NO = #{v_no} ORDER BY V.V_NO
